column1: Smoque BBQ////can we say carnivore heaven??.. the brisket
column4: the ribs... omg this made me loveeeeee non-babyback ribs... and then the pulled pork... the peach cobbler... OMGOMGOMGOGOMG
column5: I can't even write a normal review about this
column7: plain delicious.... and so cheap for so much food.... I'm even a fan of their coleslaw (I never eat coleslaw
column8: but I ate theirs... I hate mayo so I was so happy it was sans mayo)
